thread.title: Brazil's BNDES posts slight fall in net profit in 2017

title: Brazil's BNDES posts slight fall in net profit in 2017
text: March 14, 2018 / 1:53 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago Brazil's BNDES posts slight fall in net profit in 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read SAO PAULO, March 14 (Reuters) - Brazilian state development bank BNDES reported a 2017 net profit of 6.18 billion reais ($1.90 billion) on Wednesday, down about 3 percent from the year before. BNDES said its results were helped by the improving performance of its equity investments, but hurt by a strong fall in profit in its financial intermediation business. $1 = 3.25 reais Reporting by Gram Slattery Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
